about_the_game:
Try the first 20 levels of Roboban: Colours with this demo! Your game saves will be kept if you wish to purchase the full game later.



Roboban: Colors is a single player Sokoban style puzzle video game in which you control robots that have to reach their recharge sites, but not before ordering the boxes in their corresponding destination.



You will have the help of several robots to complete the challenges that will be presented to you in each level, and you will be able to choose the color of the robots you want to control at any time.



The levels are divided into 4 worlds where you will find new obstacles that will make each level more challenging.

  • 90 handmade levels.
  • Undo function.
  • Adorable robots.

Ready to test your wits?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard.
